title: Train service delay between Tampines and Pasir Ris stations due to track fault

title_translations.zh-Hans: 由于轨道故障，淡滨尼和巴西立站之间的火车服务延误
title_translations.ms: Perkhidmatan kereta api tertangguh antara stesen Tampines dan Pasir Ris kerana kerosakan trek
title_translations.ta: தம்பினஸ் மற்றும் பாசிர் ரிஸ் நிலையங்களுக்கு இடையில் ரயில் சேவை தாமதம் காரணமாக தட கோளாறு

updates.text: Train service has resumed between Tampines and Pasir Ris stations.
Expect additional 10 minutes traveling time between Tampines and Pasir Ris. Our Engineers are at site rectifying the fault.
Due to earlier track fault at Pasir Ris, please estimate10mins additional traveling time from Tampines to Pasir Ris on both bounds.
Train service between Tampines and Pasir Ris has resumed. Trains are moving at a slower speed.Our Engineers are rectifying the fault.
Train service delay for 20mins time between Tampines and Pasir Ris stations due to track fault.
